summary: The diff partially adds the requested markdown outline document, but the added file content is truncated and does not provide enough visible evidence that the required explicit test cases, multi-tenant/workflow/failure scenarios, and the manual multi-identity execution plan are actually included. Additionally, several frontend code changes appear that were not requested by REQ-18/REQ-19.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a compact test suite outline document for the shared interoperability layer enumerating API tests for getInteropContext, getUserRole, and logActivity including isolation tests, contract/shape assertions, multi-tenant boundary tests, workflow-chain tests, and failure-condition tests with the specified explicit scenarios.
missing_requirements.reason: While a new markdown file exists and begins an outline, the visible content only shows the title, overview, and the start of one isolation test (Anonymous/No Profile). The diff content is truncated before any explicit coverage for the required getInteropContext cases (no active org, active org, role resolution), logActivity cases, multi-tenant boundaries, workflow-chain scenarios, and failure-condition tests can be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include a minimal, repeatable manual test execution plan using multiple identities with concrete steps, preconditions, expected observations, and referencing exact backend methods (getInteropContext, saveCallerUserProfile, createOrganization, joinOrganization, getUserRole, logActivity) only.
missing_requirements.reason: The added markdown content shown does not include (within the visible/truncated portion) a manual execution plan, multiple-identity steps, or the required explicit method references and expected outputs/observations. Therefore implementation cannot be confirmed from the provided diff excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/modified frontend shared interoperability hook and related org-aware logging helpers.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-18/REQ-19 only request adding a markdown test-suite outline document; no frontend functionality changes were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend React Query hooks and role-based access component behavior to use shared interoperability context and updated role querying.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-18/REQ-19, which are documentation-only requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated multiple micro-app shell pages to use the shared interoperability layer for activity logging.
